company: Microelectronics and Embedded System Laboratory ITS
description: Digital circuit practicum is one of the compulsory practicum for all EE students in ITS. There are 4 modules : 1. Logic gates 2. Encoder and Decoder 3. Multiplexer and Demultiplexer (MUX and DEMUX) 4. Flip-flop, shift register and counter

IRIS Robotic Course and Competition (IRC) is an event held by IRIS Robotic Team. The robotic competition is divided into two categories, mini soccer competition for primary and junior high school students and line follower competition for senior high school, college students and public. My job desk for this event is to make the rules and referee the mini soccer competition.

Responsible for licensing of EVOLVE subevent. EVOLUTION aims to mantain and improve the reputation of Electrical Engineering ITS, improve the understanding of people about technology advancement, grow a competitive, problem-solving, and innovative soul between participants through competitions held.
